reviewText: Ok, disclosure first, my son made this movie. But it really is a fun movie. Ok some of the acting is a bit stiff, and the plot meanders a bit. I could have used a more satisfying ending, but that's just me I suppose. If your looking for an hour and a half of good clean fun, I think you'll find this movie charming, witty, and thoughtful. My reccomendation is to buy this film, if only to support his future endevours.
Great movie - I don't have much to say about it, I just thought I just needed to correct a balance in the stars.
